Sentencas: The ESB/GDC bilayer electrolyte concept has been proved to improve open circuit voltage and reduce the effective area specific resistance of SOFCs utilizing a conventional single-layer GDC electrolyte.
Titulo: High-performance bilayered electrolyte intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, high performance from such bilayer cells had not yet been demonstrated.
Titulo: High-performance bilayered electrolyte intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The main obstacles toward this end have been fabrication of anode-supported thin-film electrolytes and the reactivity of ESB with conventional cathodes, Recently, an ESB-compatible low area specific resistance cathode was developed: microstructurally optimized Bi2Ru2O7-ESB composites.
Titulo: High-performance bilayered electrolyte intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, we recently developed a novel anode functional layer which can significantly enhance the performance of SOFC utilizing GDC electrolytes.
Titulo: High-performance bilayered electrolyte intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study combines these recent achievements in SOFC studies and shows that exceptionally high performance of SOFC is possible using ESB/GDC bilayer electrolytes and Bi2Ru2O7-ESB composite cathodes.
Titulo: High-performance bilayered electrolyte intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The result confirms that the bilayer electrolyte and the Bi2Ru2O7-ESB cathode can increase the open circuit potential and reduce the total area specific resistance.
Titulo: High-performance bilayered electrolyte intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The maximum power density of the bilayered SOFC was improved to 1.95 W cm(-2) with 0.079 Omega cm(2) total cell area specific resistance at 650 degrees C.
Titulo: High-performance bilayered electrolyte intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This is the highest power yet achieved in the IT range and we believe redefines the expectation level for maximum power under IT-SOFC operating conditions.
Titulo: High-performance bilayered electrolyte intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
